required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Multi-Center, Double-Masked, Randomized, Vehicle-Controlled, Parallel-Group Clinical Trial Evaluating the Safety of Reproxalap Ophthalmic Solution in Subjects With Dry Eye Disease
clinical_study.official_title: A Multi-Center, Double-Masked, Randomized, Vehicle-Controlled, Parallel-Group Clinical Trial Evaluating the Safety of 0.25% Reproxalap Ophthalmic Solution in Subjects With Dry Eye Disease

brief_summary.textblock: A Multi-Center, Double-Masked, Randomized, Vehicle-Controlled, Parallel-Group Clinical Trial Evaluating the Safety of 0.25% Reproxalap Ophthalmic Solution in Subjects with Dry Eye Disease

study_design_info.masking: Quadruple (Participant, Care Provider, Investigator, Outcomes Assessor)

primary_outcome.time_frame: Safety assessment period (Day 1 through Day 28 or Day 1 through Day 360)
primary_outcome.description: Percentages of subjects with ocular treatment-emergent adverse events (TEAEs).

arm_group.arm_group_label: Reproxalap Ophthalmic Solution (0.25%) QID for four weeks followed by BID for two weeks.
Vehicle Ophthalmic Solution QID for four weeks followed by BID for two weeks.
Reproxalap Ophthalmic Solution (0.25%) QID for four weeks followed by BID for 11 months.
Vehicle Ophthalmic Solution QID for four weeks followed by BID for 11 months.

intervention.description: Reproxalap Ophthalmic Solution (0.25%) administered for six weeks (QID for four weeks then BID for two weeks).
intervention.arm_group_label: Reproxalap Ophthalmic Solution (0.25%) QID for four weeks followed by BID for two weeks.

intervention.description: Vehicle Ophthalmic Solution administered for six weeks (QID for four weeks then BID for two weeks).
intervention.arm_group_label: Vehicle Ophthalmic Solution QID for four weeks followed by BID for two weeks.

intervention.description: Reproxalap Ophthalmic Solution (0.25%) administered for one year (QID for four weeks then BID for 11 months).
intervention.arm_group_label: Reproxalap Ophthalmic Solution (0.25%) QID for four weeks followed by BID for 11 months.

intervention.description: Vehicle Ophthalmic Solution administered for one year (QID for four weeks then BID for 11 months).
intervention.arm_group_label: Vehicle Ophthalmic Solution QID for four weeks followed by BID for 11 months.
